channel.title: Health Check on Andrei Shilov
channel.description: Recent content in Health Check on Andrei Shilov

item.title: Sling health check hints
item.description: How improve your health check with info and hint messages May be you are already familiar with AEM operations dashboard if not check this. On this dashboard you can find a lot of useful tools but now we are interested in “HealthCheck Reports” You can overview several of them and notice that some of them has hints and info messages at the top. You can easy find how to create a healthcheck over the internet, but how to add ‘hints’ or ‘info’ messages not.
